name: Happiny
author: Yuka Morii
flavor_text: It loves round white things. It carries and egg-shaped rock in imitation of CHANSEY.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Chansey from your hand onto Happiny (this counts as evolving Happiny) and remove all damage counters from Happiny.

attacks.name: Lively
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.
